meanings.definition: Waste matter carried away in sewers or drains.
meanings.sent1: The sewage flowed through the pipes underground.
meanings.sent2: The city workers were cleaning the sewage system.
meanings.sent3: The sewage decided to take a vacation and clogged up the drain.
meanings.sent4: The sewage of lies polluted the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The smell of sewage lingered in the air, making everyone cringe.

meanings.definition: The system of pipes, tanks, etc., that removes sewage.
meanings.sent1: The sewage treatment plant processed all the waste efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The sewage infrastructure needed regular maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The sewage system threw a surprise party for the workers.
meanings.sent4: The sewage network acted like a silent hero, keeping the city clean.
meanings.sent5: The sewage disposal facility worked tirelessly to protect the environment.
